text: Rand Beers (born November 30, 1942) is an American government official. He was Deputy Homeland Security Advisor to the President of the United States during the Barack Obama administration.https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/federal- eye/wp/2014/01/03/rand-beers-heads-to-white-house/ He also was acting United States Secretary of Homeland Securityhttps://www.dhs.gov/acting-secretary- rand-beers following the resignation of Secretary Janet Napolitano on September 6, 2013, until Jeh Johnson replaced her on December 23, 2013. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Homeland Security Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
